name: Talsaluq: Tower of Infinity
description: A maze-adventure game entailing multi-level trials to reach the peak of a 3,000 year-old tower.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 (2nd Gen) 2350M / 2.3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 (6th Gen) 6500U / 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 Storage: 2 GB available space
